Name: Thimphu
Description: Thimphu (ཐིམ་ཕུག།) is the capital of the Kingdom of Bhutan, and with a population of around 100,000 is the nation's largest city.

Name: Jakar
Description: Jakar (altitude 2,800 m) is the principal administrative town of Bumthang district in the north of Bhutan.

Name: Mongar
Description: Mongar town is administrative head of Mongar district in Eastern Bhutan. Perched on a hill, the old bazaar area has been expanded extensively in recent years, making the town one of the region's largest settlements.

Name: Paro
Description: Paro (population 4,500) is a town in the south west of Bhutan.

Name: Punakha
Description: Punakha, a former capital of Bhutan, is in the west of the country.

Name: Phuentsholing
Description: Phuentsholing (also sometimes spelled Phuntsholing), the second largest town in Bhutan (population around 40,000), is on the Indian border, next to the town of Jaigaon.

Name: Samdrup Jongkhar
Description: Samdrup Jongkhar is regional head of Samdrup Jongkhar district and the largest town in east Bhutan.

Name: Trashigang
Description: Trashigang is an administrative town of 4,500 people in Eastern Bhutan. The traditional architecture and narrow streets give the town a quaint and snug feel, not unlike an Italian or Cornish fishing village.

Name: Trongsa
Description: Trongsa is in town in Bhutan, often known as the gateway to the east of the country.

Name: Jigme Dorji National Park
Description: Jigme Dorji National Park is in north western Bhutan.

Name: Jigme Singye Wangchuck National Park
Description: Jigme Singye Wangchuk National Park is in Central Bhutan.

Name: Royal Manas National Park
Description: Royal Manas National Park is in Central Bhutan.

Name: Phrumsengla National Park
Description: Phrumsengla National Park (formerly Thrumshingla National Park) is located in Eastern Bhutan.

Name: Bumdeling Wildlife Sanctuary
Description: Bumdeling Wildlife Sanctuary is in North East Bhutan.

Name: Jomotsangkha Wildlife Sanctuary
Description: Jomotsangkha Wildlife Sanctuary (formerly Khaling Wildlife Sanctuary) is in Samdrup Jongkhar district in Bhutan.

Name: Sakteng Wildlife Sanctuary
Description: Sakteng Wildlife Sanctuary is in Trashigang district of Bhutan.

Name: Jigme Khesar Strict Nature Reserve
Description: Jigme Khesar Strict Nature Reserve (formerly Toorsa Strict Nature Reserve) is in the Haa district in western Bhutan.
